comment: I was very well attended by the sellers, all friendly and helpful.
The store is well organized and comfortable, I liked the spacious area.
I bought a shoe that came with a defect, but it was quickly replaced.
I found the prices of the products very high compared to other stores.
Congratulations to the team for the great service! I am very satisfied.
The Avenida card limit is very low, I can't make larger purchases.
I had difficulty paying with the Grupo Avenida card, the system went down.
The line at the checkout was huge, I took a long time to be served.
I went to buy a t-shirt, but my size was not available.
The store's products are of great quality, I highly recommend them!
The experience was great, but I think the insurance they offer is not very clear.
I was well attended, but I think they could improve the store's air conditioning.
The installment on the Grupo Avenida card has very high interest rates.
I bought a wonderful dress, I loved the fabric and the quality!
The shoe prices are great, very affordable!
The store was crowded and I took a long time to be served in the fitting room.
I found the environment very pleasant, the music was at a good volume.
I couldn't buy the perfume I wanted, it was out of stock.
I tried to use my Avenida card, but I didn't have enough balance for a simple purchase.
The employees were very polite and solved my issue quickly.
Few employees at the checkout
They could have more payment options, I missed other card brands.
Few product options, I missed more variety.
The company's website is very slow and the e-commerce no longer exists, it was a negative point.
The employees were very polite and solved my issue quickly.
